(2015) }} |标题颜色 = #8968CD |左栏颜色 = #E5E5E5 |标题字体颜色 = #000000 }} *由[[EGOIST]]的主唱chelly演唱的单曲。这是首张由chelly演唱并以[[supercell]]名义发布的单曲。 *收录了3DS游戏《勇气默示录2：终结次元》的OP「[[Great Distance]]」和ED「[[Last Song]]」。 {{tracklist | headline = | all_music = | all_lyrics = | longnote_column = no | title1 = '''[[Great Distance]]''' | length1 = 4:33 | title2 = '''[[Last Song]]''' | length2 = 5:29 | title3 = '''Great Distance -Instrumental-''' | length3 = 4:33 | title4 = '''Last Song -Instrumental-''' | length4 = 5:29 }} {{ryo}} ==外部链接== *[http://famraws.lofter.com/post/1cf7cad9_6f94688 歌词出处] [[分类:日本音乐作品]] [[分类:片尾曲]] [[分类:勇气默示录音乐]] [[分类:supercell歌曲]] [[Category:Chelly歌曲]]
